name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<isize, N> as core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt>::signum

core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt::is_p.doc: Returns true for each positive element and false if it is zero or negative.

core_simd::simd::num::int::SimdInt::is_n.doc: Returns true for each negative element and false if it is zero or positive.
